DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Decreasing amount fat diet increase fruit vegetable intake may help prevent type cancer . Giving low-income participant easy-to-read write nutrition material instructional motivational videotape may help improve eat habit . PURPOSE : This randomized clinical trial study well nutrition education improve eat habit low-income healthy participant eat unhealthy diet .
DOC.brief_title: Nutrition Education Low-Income Healthy Participants Who Eat Unhealthy Diet
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Test culturally linguistically appropriate English Spanish language version motivational instructional video low literacy write nutrition material focus improve eat habit , particularly decrease fat consumption increase fruit vegetable intake non-Hispanic Hispanic low-income participant , determine intervention component effective decrease fat intake increase fruit vegetable intake . - Determine participant receive tailor nutrition information several mailing ( MT ) decrease fat consumption increase fruit vegetable intake participant receive information one mailing ( ST ) . - Determine participant receive tailor nutrition information several sequential `` interactively retailored '' mailing ( MTI ) decrease fat consumption increase fruit vegetable intake MT participant . - Compare dietary change achieve tailored educational approach comparison group receive nontailored write nutritional material ( NT ) . - Compare differential cost tailor educational approach . - Study result randomize trial term specific eat behavior , stage change , self-efficacy , decisional balance , barrier make dietary change . OUTLINE : This randomize , control study . Participants complete baseline interview . A subset participant complete second interview baseline . Participants randomize 1 4 education arm . - Arm I ( non-tailored write nutrition material ) : Participants receive non-tailored write nutrition information 1 installment . - Arm II ( tailor nutrition information ) : Participants receive tailor write nutrition information 1 installment . Participants also receive motivational instructional video . - Arm III ( tailor nutrition information multiple mailing ) : Participants receive tailor write nutrition information 4 small installment 12 week . Participants also receive motivational instructional video . - Arm IV ( multiple sequential `` interactively tailor '' mailing ) : Participants receive tailor write nutrition information motivational instructional video arm III . Participants may mail follow-up assessment order retailor information receive later installment . After completion study intervention , patient follow 4 7 month . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 2,000 participant accrue study .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Healthy low income participant eat unhealthy diet Not already healthy diet PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Able read basic Spanish English Not pregnant No acute chronic medical condition would prevent participant make basic healthful dietary change No significant visual and/or hear impairment Not household another study participant PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Not specify
DOC.keyword: unspecified adult solid tumor , protocol specific
